item.title: Hugo theme component for JSON feed custom Output Format.
item.description:
Hugo JSON Feed

Hugo theme component for JSON feed custom Output Format.

This component enables JSON feeds for your site.

Demo

  • Home Feed
  • Section Feed
  • Term Feed

Install Component

The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:

item.title: Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.
item.description:
cmpt-mdevtools

Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.

Requirements

  • FixIt v0.3.9 or later.
  • eruda
  • vConsole

Install Component

The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
